snippet: A disputed attack in Marinka, a farming village southeast of Donetsk, killed five civilians and caused anger among residents.
abstract: Rocket attack in Marinka, southeast of Donetsk, Ukraine, appears to be part of broader advance by Ukrainian forces against pro-Russian insurgency; military also hits rebel positions in Horlivka, crucial town to north, and in Karlovka, town with strategic bridge; attack in Marinka leaves five civilians dead and four wounded and angers residents.

byline.contributor: Noah Sneider contributed reporting from Donetsk, Ukraine.

lead_paragraph: A disputed attack in Marinka, a farming village southeast of Donetsk, killed five civilians and caused anger among residents.

headline.main: Civilians Pay a Price for Gains of Ukraine Forces
headline.print_headline: Civilians Pay a Price for Gains of Ukraine Forces
